item.title: Album Review: Foghorn in the Dawn by 오미일곱 [Omilgop]
item.description: Embark on an ethereal journey as 오미일곱 [Omilgop] unveils their mesmerizing opus, Foghorn in the Dawn.

item.title: Album Review: Demon Days by Gorillaz
